StringProperty.Name: MODEL_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of the model published in the database, also the name of the executable (possibly with an appended suffix). The default is the name of the grandparent folder of the project file.

StringProperty.Name: SCENARIO_NAME
StringProperty.Description: The name of the default scenario published in the database. The default is Default.

StringProperty.Name: MODEL_CODE_DIR
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing model source code modules (*.mpp, *.ompp, *.cpp, *.h). The path is relative to the project file. The default is ../code.

StringProperty.Name: SCENARIO_PARAMETERS_FOLDER
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing modifiable parameter values (*.dat and *.odat) for the published scenario. The path is relative to the project file. The default is ../parameters/$(SCENARIO_NAME).

StringProperty.Name: FIXED_PARAMETERS_FOLDER
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing fixed parameter values (*.dat and *.odat) for the model. The path is relative to the project file. If empty, the fixed parameters folder is disabled. A typical value if enabled is ../parameters/Fixed.

StringProperty.Name: OMC_USE_DIR
StringProperty.Description: The folder containing common framework modules. The path is absolute. The default is $(OM_ROOT)/use.

BoolProperty.Name: USE_PCH
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Enable pre-compiled headers in C++ compilation

BoolProperty.Name: NO_LINE_DIRECTIVES
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Disable generation of #line directives by OpenM++ compiler.

BoolProperty.Name: RUN_SCENARIO
BoolProperty.Description: Run the scenario after building and publishing the model and scenario.

IntProperty.Name: MEMBERS
IntProperty.Description: A run can be divided into a number of independent members (aka sub-samples or replicates)

IntProperty.Name: PROCESSES
IntProperty.DisplayName: Number of processes to launch (requires MPI)

IntProperty.Name: THREADS
IntProperty.DisplayName: Number of threads in each process

BoolProperty.Name: EXPORT_EXCEL_LAUNCH
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Launch Excel after export to Excel
